mapper.update: UPDATE review SET RATING=#{rating}, REVIEW_TITLE=#{reviewTitle}, REVIEW_CONTENT=#{reviewContent}, REVIEW_DATE=now(), REVIEW_IMAGE=#{reviewImg} WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review( REVIEW_ID, PRODUCT_ID, USER_NO, RATING, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_IMAGE) VALUES( (SELECT MAX(REVIEW_ID) FROM review GROUB BY REVIEW_ID), #{product_id}, #{user_no}, #{rating}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, now(), #{review_image})
